Text: Hehehe... I can't wait...
Enter.
Pardon me.
Lambda...?
Aah! I knew it! Just as Lady Gamma feared...
Jeez... I haven’t even started any experiments yet.

I've just brought her to my lab and let her sleep
here...so that I can start at any time!

Ulp... That may be so, but please at least wait for
Lady Alpha's decision!
Ugh...

Even if this possessed turns out to be one of
the Cult's pawns—
Lambda...?
This woman... It can't be!
You know her?
N-No...not personally, but...!

Anyway, I must report to the other Seven Shadows
immediately!
...They're all at a meeting in the castle.

Lady Eta...please, I implore you, don't do anything
just yet!
Jeez...

Please! At least until we can confirm the necessary
details!
...You sound just like Gamma...
Fine... I'll hold off for a bit longer.

I am eternally grateful! Well then, if you'll excuse
me!
...I might not get to...experiment on you...

...Karen von Herzog's condition has stabilized. She's
currently in a deep sleep due to exhaustion.

Her right leg is back to normal, but her right eye
injury appears unrelated to the sarcoma from
the possession...

If Lord Shadow were here, he could heal her old
wounds as well...but I lack the ability!

Don't be too hard on yourself, Epsilon. Even I can't
heal without leaving any marks, especially if it's a
deep scar.

According to Gamma's report, she used her afflicted
right leg as a shield to block the greatsword thrown
at her... So long as the leg carries no residual
effects, then it was a great success.
Lady Alpha... Thank you.

...That said, a possessed leader from the Cult of
Diablos, huh?

We could extract intel from her and prevent her from
leaking our secrets by...

Hold on, Beta! She defended me in a life-or-death
situation!
We can't just kill her without a second thought!

I-I'm just talking hypothetically...and I never said
we should kill her! But the Cult is our enemy, so
we need to consider other scenarios—

Maybe so, but we shouldn't be talking like that when
we're still unsure if she really is the enemy!

The other swordsman...Sergey knew about the Shadow
Garden, didn't he?

Perhaps it's a ploy to send a spy into the Garden
under the pretense of a falling out...
Absolutely not, Beta!
Both of you, calm down.

I was the one who ultimately instructed Gamma to
bring her to Alexandria to recover.
Lady Alpha...

Now that I think about it, curing the possessed can
be done anywhere so long as Lady Alpha or I am there.

That's right, but I brought her here to the Garden
for a specific reason.
A reason...specific to the Garden?

If she's indeed a leader abandoned by the Cult for
becoming possessed... We, the Shadow Garden, will
present ourselves openly and provide her with a
choice.

If we obtain secret intel on the Cult along with a
competent subordinate as a result...that will further
clarify the Garden's position.

Should the Cult not tolerate the possessed under any
circumstances, then it carries great significance for
the Shadow Garden to show the opposite path.
Lady Alpha—

...But it will be her decision whether to follow the
path shown to her by the Shadow Garden.

If necessary, I am prepared to take responsibility
and dispose of her with my own hands.
Whaaat?!
Heheh. Even you seem surprised, Beta.

N-No... It's just that...if that's the case, then you
won't hear anything more from me for now.

In other words, even if they're saying the same
thing, Lady Alpha's words carry much more
weight than Beta's!

Members of the Seven Shadows! Excuse me for
interrupting your meeting!
Lambda? I thought I asked you to check on Eta—

Indeed! I've come to report urgent intel regarding
the possessed Cult leader!
...You know something about her?
Indeed! I do!
She is Karen von Herzog!

Heiress to the Herzog Family, one of the oldest and
most prestigious aristocratic families in Velgalta...
with territories in the Empire since ancient times,
and she is also one of Velgalta's Seven Blades!
...If only it were just that...
Lady Gamma?

...Lambda. Can you tell us what you know about
Karen von Herzog and the Herzog Family from
your perspective as a former soldier of the
Velgalta Empire?

And I would also like to hear your opinion on what we
are up against.
Sir! Yes sir!
